ComicInfo.Title: Circuit Death; Escape Velocity
ComicInfo.Summary:
Circuit Death: Chyia and Morgana battle Drang, Chyvia's brother computer, for control of Mars. Drang is defeated as the saga concludes.
Escape Velocity: Daro, Pomru and the two others bunker down while the big blast turns Fergusson into a star. They survive and attempt to contact command forces.
ComicInfo.Writer: Mark Wheatley,Marc Hempel,John Ostrander,Mark Wheatley,Marc Hempel,John Ostrander
ComicInfo.Penciller: Mark Wheatley,Marc Hempel,Doug Rice,Mark Wheatley,Marc Hempel,Doug Rice
ComicInfo.Inker: Mark Wheatley,Marc Hempel,Doug Rice,Mark Wheatley,Marc Hempel,Doug Rice
ComicInfo.Colorist: Mark Wheatley,Marc Hempel,Kathryn Mayer,Rick Taylor,Mark Wheatley,Marc Hempel,Kathryn Mayer,Rick Taylor
ComicInfo.Letterer: Mark Wheatley,Marc Hempel,Kathryn Mayer,Rick Taylor,Mark Wheatley,Marc Hempel,Kathryn Mayer,Rick Taylor
